Container.Name: orpheusmorebetter
Container.Overview:
CLI-only container to automatically transcode FLACs and upload to Orpheus Network. No web UI or listening ports. Configuration is done via files under /config. Supports all upstream command-line options including automatic candidate searching, manual URL processing, and various transcoding modes.
First run: Edit /config/.orpheusmorebetter/config with your credentials.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (99=nobody on Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (100=users on Unraid)

Config.Name: Data
Config.Description: Source FLAC files (match your torrent client's path)
